text: Nicholas John Frost (born 28 March 1972) is an English actor, comedian and screenwriter. He is best known for playing roles like Mike Watt in Spaced, Ed in Shaun of the Dead, Danny Butterman in Hot Fuzz, Clive Gollings in Paul, and Ron in Attack the Block. He is also known for working with Simon Pegg. Frost was born on 28 March 1972 in Dagenham, London, England. He studied at Bell High School. He is married to Christina Frost. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from London Category:Comedians from London Category:English movie actors Category:English screenwriters Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors Category:People from the London Borough of Barking and Dagenham Category:Writers from London
title: Nick Frost
